description:
Developed with EWS pros, these tires can handle everything enduro tracks throw at them. If you like a rugged tire that corners aggressively and clears mud with easy, then you’ll appreciate the Wild Enduro’s MAGI-X2 rubber that focuses on braking and cornering grip, as well as durability.

  • MAGI-X2 rubber is firm and aggressive, designed using technology from MotoGP, this compound excels in the wet, mud, and deep loam, while still being able to stand up to rock gardens
  • Tread optimized for front or rear, so make sure you snag the right one
  • Large center blocks bite into the trail for great straight line control and power transfer
  • Directional side lugs for grip in the corners
  • Gravity Shield 3x60 TPI casing for increased puncture resistance without sacrificing ride comfort
  • Tubeless ready
name: Michelin Wild Enduro Magi-X 27.5x2.4 Tire
